Description

Mendel Sensors builds easy to use environmental sensors with best in class apps and analytics to take the guesswork out of growing, help increase yields and educate growers. As a company we strive to make smarts tools (both software and hardware) for indoor farmers growing anything from cannabis to microgreens to orchids and seedlings.

History

We started Mendel Sensors after learning from our experience building RapidLED, a manufacturer of LED and DIY LED parts for a variety of industries including aquariums, laboratories and indoor farmers. We quickly realized that horticulture was where we wanted to focus our efforts and partnered with Current Labs, a company that makes IoT sensors.
